Reviews.Title: Didn't work!
Reviews.Author: A Simon
Reviews.Content: It worked for 30 mins. The battery didn't hold life. I swapped the battery and still nothing. I couldn't get into the phone to do anything. I couldn't get passed the open screen. The touch icons wouldn't work. It kept telling me to charge the battery. Once it charged the phone simply didn't function.

Reviews.Title: Do not recommend this phone...
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: This phone does not hold charge, either battery.. Also you can't receive picture messages.. Very displeased with this purchase... Id give half star if I could..

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Dondra
Reviews.Content: This phone is not anything as I thought it would be. The Internet is really slow. It is not a reliable phone .

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Phone but ONLY works with AT&T;
Reviews.Author: Wilsherie Hopson
Reviews.Content: It looks very pretty but you must have service with At&T; only in order for it to fully work properly.  It froze up on me and dropped calls and the screen blanked out multiple times. The phone was beautiful though and that was about it for me.

Reviews.Title: don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: peggy l williams
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this worse phone ever. Nothing is like they say it's not even a samsung it's some horrible off bran  I have never even heard of

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Courtney
Reviews.Content: Its terrible. The phone dont work 99.9% of the time. The pictures are terrible. The internet is terrible. The whole phone is just terrible

Reviews.Title: sim quadband not working
Reviews.Author: dona weekes
Reviews.Content: All of the sim quadbands worked.  I will be returning the phone. I thought the phone was samsung galaxy not Icherry

Reviews.Title: disappointing
Reviews.Author: jeremy yoder
Reviews.Content: This phone did not perform as advertised. I'm very disappointed. I will not be buying another phone like it without significant proof that it does work.

Reviews.Title: sucks
Reviews.Author: Annette W.
Reviews.Content: This phone is awful it freezes up and is very cheap made and definately doesn't compare to the galaxy! ....

Reviews.Title: Hate it
Reviews.Author: Deb Coveyou
Reviews.Content: Yes don't like this phone at all I thought I was buying a Samsung galaxy here it was just a crappy through back, lesson learned pay vlose attention and this seller I will not be buying from ever again

Reviews.Title: Great Phone Thanks
Reviews.Author: Tia83062
Reviews.Content: I really like the phone. It was easy to buy the sim card and minutes. Fast delivery thank you for a great product.

ProductInfo.Name: Galaxy Black unlocked phone 4 inch capacitive android dual SIM quadband smart cell smartphone
